tool_description: This API contains details about the cases in India and various states/Union Territories. Also, It contains the data  about tested samples and the top headlines regarding the novel Coronavirus.
name: COVID-19 India
title: COVID-19 India

api_list.name: Helpline Numbers
api_list.description: In the response of this API, you'll get the list of all the Helpline Numbers of the States and the Union Territories.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-india.p.rapidapi.com/helpline_numbers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Country Data and Samples Tested Stats
api_list.description: In the response of this API, you'll get the details of passengers screened count, active cases, recovered cases, migrated cases and death cases.

api_list.name: COVID Headlines
api_list.description: In the response of this API, you'll get the headlines,thumbnails and the corresponding news summary.

api_list.name: States and Union Territory Data
api_list.description: In the response of this API, you'll get the details of confirmed cases count, cured cases and death cases.
